testSuite.name: Dar Libya Vacation Rental Platform Test Suite

testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Check for multiple interactive elements (buttons, forms, links, search bar)
Verify navigation menu is present and functional
Check for property listings or search functionality
Verify the page shows real vacation rental content, not placeholder text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays functional vacation rental marketplace with search, listings, and navigation
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or generic template content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: User Login - Email
testCases.description: Test user login with email identifier
preconditions: User must not be logged in
steps: Verify successful redirect to homepage or dashboard
Verify user menu shows logged-in state
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs in and sees authenticated UI
testCases.failureCondition: Error message displayed or login fails

testCases.name: User Login - Phone Number
testCases.description: Test user login with phone number identifier
preconditions: User must not be logged in
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs in using phone number
testCases.failureCondition: Login fails or error displayed

testCases.name: Invalid Login Credentials
testCases.description: Verify error handling for invalid credentials
steps: Verify user remains on login page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Error message displayed indicating invalid credentials
testCases.failureCondition: User is logged in or no error message shown

testCases.name: User Registration
preconditions: User must not be logged in
steps: Fill in email field with unique email
testCases.expectedOutcome: New user account created and user logged in
testCases.failureCondition: Registration fails or validation errors shown

testCases.name: User Logout
steps: Click on user menu in navigation
Verify protected routes are no longer accessible
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logged out and authentication cleared
testCases.failureCondition: User remains logged in or can access protected routes

testCases.name: Homepage Navigation
testCases.description: Verify homepage loads and displays main content
steps: Check for featured listings or browse options
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays with search bar, listings preview, and navigation
testCases.failureCondition: Page fails to load or missing core components

testCases.name: Top Navigation Menu
steps: Check for login/signup links (when logged out)
Check for user menu (when logged in)
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links work correctly
testCases.failureCondition: Any navigation link broken or leads to 404

testCases.name: Protected Route Access
preconditions: User must not be logged in
testCases.expectedOutcome: Unauthenticated users redirected to login
testCases.failureCondition: Protected routes accessible without authentication

testCases.name: Basic Property Search
steps: Check that results show property cards with images
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search results page displays available properties
testCases.failureCondition: No results shown or search fails

testCases.name: Search with Location Filter
testCases.expectedOutcome: Results filtered by location
testCases.failureCondition: Non-matching locations shown

testCases.name: Search with Date Range
testCases.expectedOutcome: Results show only available properties for selected dates
testCases.failureCondition: Unavailable properties shown

testCases.name: Search with Price Range
steps: Verify all results within price range
testCases.expectedOutcome: Results filtered by price range
testCases.failureCondition: Properties outside range shown

testCases.name: Search with Amenities Filter
steps: Click on a property and verify amenities listed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Results show only properties with selected amenities
testCases.failureCondition: Properties without amenities shown

testCases.name: View Property Details
preconditions: At least one property exists in database
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete property details displayed with all information
testCases.failureCondition: Missing key information or 404 error

testCases.name: Property Photo Gallery
testCases.expectedOutcome: Photo gallery functional with all images
testCases.failureCondition: Images fail to load or gallery broken

testCases.name: Create Booking Request
preconditions: User must be logged in as guest
steps: Click 'Request to Book' or similar button
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking request created and visible in guest trips
testCases.failureCondition: Booking fails or error displayed

testCases.name: View Booking Details
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete booking details displayed
testCases.failureCondition: Missing information or page fails to load

testCases.name: Host Approve Booking
preconditions: Pending booking exists for host property
steps: Verify booking status changes to confirmed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking status updated to confirmed
testCases.failureCondition: Status not updated or error occurs

testCases.name: Cancel Booking
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking successfully cancelled
testCases.failureCondition: Cancellation fails or status not updated

testCases.name: Access Host Dashboard
testCases.description: Test host dashboard access and content
testCases.expectedOutcome: Host dashboard displays with all sections
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard fails to load or missing sections

testCases.name: Create New Listing
testCases.description: Test creating a new property listing
testCases.expectedOutcome: New listing created successfully
testCases.failureCondition: Form validation errors or creation fails

testCases.name: Edit Existing Listing
preconditions: User owns at least one listing
testCases.expectedOutcome: Listing successfully updated
testCases.failureCondition: Changes not saved or errors occur

testCases.name: Manage Property Availability
steps: Check that blocked dates not bookable
testCases.expectedOutcome: Availability calendar updated successfully
testCases.failureCondition: Changes not saved or calendar not functional

testCases.name: Send Message to Host
steps: Open message thread or start new conversation
testCases.expectedOutcome: Message sent successfully and visible in thread
testCases.failureCondition: Message fails to send or not displayed

testData.message: Hello, I have a question about check-in.

testCases.name: View Message Inbox
testCases.expectedOutcome: Inbox displays all message threads correctly
testCases.failureCondition: Messages not displayed or inbox broken

testCases.name: Mark Message as Read
steps: Verify thread no longer marked unread
testCases.expectedOutcome: Messages marked as read after viewing
testCases.failureCondition: Read status not updated

testCases.name: Submit Review for Completed Stay
testCases.expectedOutcome: Review submitted and saved (may be hidden until host reviews)
testCases.failureCondition: Review submission fails or form errors

testCases.name: View Property Reviews
testCases.description: Test viewing reviews on property page
testCases.expectedOutcome: All visible reviews displayed correctly
testCases.failureCondition: Reviews not shown or data incorrect

testCases.name: View User Profile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Profile page displays user information
testCases.failureCondition: Profile fails to load or data missing

testCases.name: Edit User Profile
steps: Refresh page and verify changes persisted
testCases.expectedOutcome: Profile updated successfully
testCases.failureCondition: Changes not saved or errors occur

testCases.name: View Host Public Profile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Public profile displays appropriate information
testCases.failureCondition: Profile fails to load or shows private data

testCases.name: Responsive Design - Mobile
steps: Verify all elements fit within viewport
testCases.expectedOutcome: All pages responsive and functional on mobile
testCases.failureCondition: Layout broken or elements overflow

testCases.name: Responsive Design - Tablet
testCases.expectedOutcome: Layout optimized for tablet screens
testCases.failureCondition: Layout issues or poor spacing

testCases.name: UI Components Display
testCases.description: Verify proper rendering of UI components
testCases.expectedOutcome: All UI components properly styled and functional
testCases.failureCondition: Broken styles or missing components

testCases.name: Loading States
steps: Check for loading spinners or skeletons
Verify loading states clear after data loads
testCases.expectedOutcome: Loading states displayed appropriately
testCases.failureCondition: No loading indication or stuck loading

testCases.name: Content Quality Test
steps: Check for substantial content beyond placeholders
Check for actual property listings data
Verify no 'Lorem ipsum' or template text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates real functionality with actual content
testCases.failureCondition: Only placeholder or template content visible

testCases.name: Image Loading
testCases.expectedOutcome: All images load successfully
testCases.failureCondition: Broken images or loading failures

testCases.name: Page Load Performance
steps: Verify pages load in reasonable time
testCases.expectedOutcome: Pages load within acceptable timeframe (under 3 seconds)
testCases.failureCondition: Excessive load times or timeouts

testCases.name: Keyboard Navigation
testCases.expectedOutcome: All interactive elements accessible via keyboard
testCases.failureCondition: Elements not reachable or keyboard traps exist

testCases.name: Screen Reader Compatibility
testCases.expectedOutcome: Content accessible to screen readers
testCases.failureCondition: Important content not announced or missing labels

testCases.name: Form Validation
testCases.expectedOutcome: Forms validate inputs and show appropriate errors
testCases.failureCondition: Validation missing or incorrect

testCases.name: 404 Error Handling
steps: Check for redirect to homepage or 404 page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Invalid routes handled gracefully
testCases.failureCondition: Blank page or application crash

testCases.name: End-to-End User Journey - Guest
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete flow works end-to-end
testCases.failureCondition: Any step fails or breaks flow

testCases.name: End-to-End User Journey - Host
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete host workflow functional
testCases.failureCondition: Any step fails

testExecution.medium_priority: Good to pass - enhances user experience

notes: All tests should be run against the production URL
Test users are seeded in database - see test_users.json
Some tests require sequential execution (e.g., create before edit)
Authentication state should be managed between tests
Tests marked 'critical' must pass for application to be considered functional
